page.title: 20MEDLICOTT MANOR COPPER MINE
page.content: At{Medlicott Farm}there is an old {copper mine.}The mine is built into the side of the hill-we call this an {adit mine.}They built it this way because it was easier and cheaper. There isn't much of the mine left now;the waste is all grassed over and the entrances are blocked up with corrugated iron. The mine ran under the hall and people living there could hear the miners at work. The mine was shut down in the 1880's because they weren't making enough money.They are now thinking of re-opening it so they can start producing copper again,as they are now able to get more copper out of the rock using new methods.
